A

act(SensorService) - Method in interface interfaces.IDriveStrategy
The act method, which can be called to perform the desired drive strategy.
act() - Method in class robot.Robot
The act method which calls the act methods of the strategies.
act(SensorService) - Method in class strategies.BackOnTrack
The act method, which let the NXT drive ever-increasing circles until a line was found.
act(SensorService) - Method in class strategies.ManualDrive
This method let the NXT drive over bluetooth.
act(SensorService) - Method in class strategies.PIDRegler
The main control method to be called in a loop.
act(SensorService) - Method in class strategies.ZickZack
Adjusts motor speeds to implement a zigzag movement pattern based on sensor input.
Action - Enum in robot
Possible actions which can be mapped on the integers from bluetooth input stream.
